short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attack On Titan Wallpaper turn new tab to HD Attack On Titan background. Custom Attack On Titan wallpaper theme for AoT fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically rotate Attack On Titan wallpapers each time a new tab is opened.
2. Customize your Attack On Titan background or set favorites in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to your frequently visited sites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel addition for fast website access.
10. Instant links to Google applications.
11. Direct access to additional themes.
12. Simplified sharing to social networks.
13. Easy download of new wallpapers.
14. Fast access to gaming interfaces.
15. Activate interactive animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Attack On Titan new tab.
